```{r}
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(boot)
library(broom)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
dados = read_csv(here::here("../result.csv"))
dados[is.na(dados)] = 0
```

```{r}
dados %>% ggplot( aes(x=method, y = puro_spearman, color=method)) + 
                      geom_jitter(width = 0.2, height =.005, alpha = 0.2)+
    geom_violin(alpha = 0.2)+
    stat_summary(fun=mean, color = "black", alpha = 0.5)+
    labs(
         x = "Método", 
         y = "Corr",
         title = "Corr por Método"
    )
```


```{r}
unique(dados$method)
```



```{r}
thetaXRAI <- function(d, i) {
    methodSum = d %>%
        slice(i) %>% 
        group_by(method) %>% 
        summarise(media = mean(puro_spearman))
    saliencyMedia = methodSum %>% filter(method == "XRAI") %>% pull(media)
    saliencyMedia
}
bootXRAI = boot(data = dados,
           statistic = thetaXRAI,
           R = 2000) %>%
    tidy(conf.level = .95,
         conf.int = TRUE)
bootXRAI$nome = "XRAI"

```

```{r}
medias <- rbind(bootBlur, bootIntegratedGradientSaliency, bootSmoothGradientSaliency, bootSmoothGradCAM, bootGradientSaliency, bootSmoothIntegratedGradientSaliency, bootXRAI)
medias %>% 
  ggplot(aes(
            ymin = conf.low,
            y = statistic,
            ymax = conf.high,
            x = nome,
            color = nome
        )) +
        geom_linerange(color = "black") +
        geom_point(size = 1) +
        scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-.3, .3)) +
        labs(x = "", y = "IC 95% Média de Correlacão")+
    coord_flip()

```


```{r}
thetaSaliencyGrad <- function(d, i) {
    methodSum = d %>%
        slice(i) %>% 
        group_by(method) %>% 
        summarise(media = mean(corr))
    saliencyMedia = methodSum %>% filter(method == "GradientSaliency") %>% pull(media)
    gradMedia = methodSum %>% filter(method == "SmoothGradCAM") %>% pull(media)
    saliencyMedia - gradMedia
}


bootSaliencyGrad = boot(data = dados,
           statistic = thetaSaliencyGrad,
           R = 2000) %>%
    tidy(conf.level = .95,
         conf.method = "bca",
         conf.int = TRUE)
bootSaliencyGrad$nome = "GradientSaliency - SmoothGradCAM"
```

```{r}
bootSaliencyGrad %>% 
  ggplot(aes(
            ymin = conf.low,
            y = statistic,
            ymax = conf.high,
            x = nome
        )) +
        geom_linerange(color = "black") +
        geom_point(size = 1, color = "blue") +
        scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-1, 1)) +
        labs(x = "", y = "IC 95% Média de Correlacão")+
    coord_flip()
```
